['Report to one of our team leads, and focus on providing high-quality Entertainment coverage across a wide range of topics.', 'Develop your own story ideas and angles based on your industry knowledge of what will perform well in the organic search space.', 'Produce 4-6 winning search articles each day by identifying trending topics and covering multiple ideas per day with a high pageview rating.', 'Achieve/maintain a monthly PV threshold that aligns with the company’s current goals.', 'Work Saturdays and Sundays to capitalize on trends that our readers are interested in during their free time. (You will also work 3 weekdays of your choosing.)', 'Collaborate with our Editorial team and join search team meetings to understand what does/doesn’t work for a story on our site. Demonstrate flexibility and a willingness to re-focus ideas when necessary.', 'Dive into research, making use of internal and external links, to show your stories are based on more than just one person’s opinion.', 'Consistently deliver high-quality, self-edited, and professional articles. Have the ability to self-edit articles and the desire to continue honing your grammar skills. Show an ability to work autonomously, particularly during weekend coverage.', 'Take a data-driven approach to writing, utilizing our in-house analytics tool and Google Analytics to gain insights on article performance. Use GA to track progress toward monthly data benchmarks of performance.', 'Promote your work on Showbiz Cheat Sheet-branded social media channels.', 'Work in a fast-paced, ever-changing, and demanding remote environment.', 'We are a recognized digital media leader with more than 35 million monthly readers.', 'We are a tightly-knit team that is passionate about the overall product and strives to be experts in the field. We have a collaborative culture driven by mutual respect that fosters regular feedback and group discussion.', 'We are an exciting, growing company and we want you to grow with us. At Showbiz Cheat Sheet, your career is what you make of it.', 'Work from home, a coffee shop, or anywhere of your choosing. We have a distributed workforce, which means that you can work from wherever you want in your hometown (or during travel!) and collaborate with brilliant colleagues from around the country.', 'We offer competitive salaries, a flexible vacation policy, paid parental leave, health, dental & vision insurance, 401k contributions, and continuing education reimbursements. Our editorial team is also eligible for monthly bonuses based on performance.', 'A four-year college degree or equivalent work experience.', 'A background in and passion for writing about a variety of topics in the Entertainment sphere, as well as a voice that you’re looking to hone.', 'A working knowledge of SEO and previous experience using WordPress is preferred, but not required.', 'A strong grasp of proper grammar and punctuation (e.g., Strunk & White’s The Elements of Style). Knowledge of AP Style is a plus.', 'The skill to recognize interesting news elements, come up with story ideas, and have these appeal to our readers.', 'The ability to self-edit thoroughly and quickly.', 'General knowledge of social media best practices is preferred, but not required.', 'A willingness to learn quickly and adapt to the varying and ever-changing demands of the job.']

job_text: ['Keep pulse on marketing trends- report on weekly competitive research and new initiatives.', 'Own the marketing calendar, ensuring that it is updated weekly and circulated to all relevant teams.', 'Sit in on marketing meetings and brainstorms; actively participate in the development of marketing strategies.', 'Build and manage key partnerships internally across marketing, merchandising, creative, design and ops.', 'Maintain briefs and support plan materials (strategy documents, decks, timelines etc.).', 'Facilitate meeting recaps.', 'Constant monitoring of onsite promotional assets and custom landing pages to report bugs.', 'Assist with adoption and optimization of new process.', 'Perform ad hoc duties to support the marketing team.', 'Understanding of marketing analytics, including digital KPIs (impressions, CTR, CPA, ROAS, etc.).', "Bachelor's Degree in Marketing or related field.", '1-2 years of experience in a coordination or project management position.', 'Exceptional organizational, time management, and communication skills.', 'Ability to juggle a variety of initiatives and adjust to changing timelines and priorities.', 'Experience in fashion, intimate apparel and/or ecommerce preferred.', 'Proven track record of identifying problems, demonstrated use of initiative thinking and implementation of appropriate solutions.', 'Sees tasks through to the end.', 'A keen eye for detail both with quantitative and qualitative data.', 'Ability to work well as part of a team under pressure.', 'Experience with project management tools (Wrike, Atlassian, JIRA, Confluence) a plus.', 'Understanding of ecommerce analytical tools (e.g. Google Analytics) a pl']

Perform GAP Analysis and document the gap between the existing system and desired system. Identify different issues/risk associated with the Epic/Feature/Stories, communicate with business team or Product owner and determine the risk mitigation plan with the team to tackle the challenges Help teams with Agile project management Ensure productivity of the team by creating and maintaining Sprint Burn-down charts to measure and estimate velocity. Create user stories with acceptance criteria, responsible for creating various user flow diagram, data flow diagram, and various ad-hoc reports as per business request. Assess various page and campaign designs to provide feedback on the marketing needs. To check API endpoints and validate all the necessary data elements are flowing through the API calls as per business and marketing needs and communicate with vendors or development team for any issues. To work with various project management leads to ensure project’s data quality. Analyze data on Google Analytics and on SQL Server to measure different KPIs, and data quality. Check website performance and identify the areas where website is having the most errors by running reports at Dynatrace and share with team. Create test cases, coordinate bug meeting and work with QA team to ensure all the scenarios are tested and pass the acceptance criteria before the launch. The consultant must be able to present complicated analytics in a clear and concise manner with client multi-channel insight team, advanced analytics team, and brand marketing.The consultant may be asked to use advanced analytic outputs to provide data driven recommendations to plan, execute, and optimize integrated multichannel campaigns. ['Media - You will be exposed to various Paid Media channels (e.g. Programmatic, Social, Search, Connected TV, Out-of-Home). We will teach you how to set up, optimize, and manage media campaigns. We will teach you best in class practices and help you understand how to use the platforms catered to each client’s unique needs - since marketing was never as dependent on technology as it is now.', 'Technology – We will teach about the most popular MarTech platforms available today. You should be excited to understand how technology works and how you can use it to add value. You will be working with what we consider to be the ‘best in class’ AdTech - since technology was never as close to marketing as it is now.', 'Communication – Finally, and critically, you will be exposed to regular communications with clients; eventually helping manage client calls and communication. Listening and understanding each client’s individual needs, requirements and expectations is something that you are going to learn over time. - since marketing will always be about people working together.', 'Analysis, Insights, Results & Reporting - You should like data and numbers and be excited about conducting basic or advanced data analysis. You need to enjoy and be proficient in Excel & Powerpoint. We will teach you how to analyze data and explain patterns/insights to clients – you will learn how to explain and influence using logic and data. We aim to help clients reallocate time and money from business activities that don’t work to marketing tactics that deliver value to the brand.', 'Project Management – You will be trained to project manage the activities and tasks in-between client calls.', 'Account Management – We will show you how to track account activity, manage expectations and ensure successful delivery of projects.', 'Accountability - you are passionate about marketing and your job', 'Communication skills - you are able to effectively communicate complex information to wide array of audiences', 'Agility - you are quick on your feet and comfortable working in a fast-paced, start-up environment', 'Curiosity - you find technology/marketing interesting and will always ask questions', 'Problem-solving skills - you are able to take what you know and seek what you don’t, to find a solution', 'Organization & time management skills - you are able to work on multiple projects at once and still meet deadlines', 'Open mind - you are comfortable with admitting that you don’t know what you don’t know', 'Educated to degree level. ['Monitor, optimize, and maintain quality and integrity of Search results on search engines.', 'Identifies trends in search engine results and works with Sr SEO Manager to develop strategies for optimizing those results for the HSN.com and QVC.com websites, based on analytics data, 3rd party tools and known best technical practices.', 'Contribute to technical enhancement requests to improve website functionality, which enables the improvement of search engine optimization, performance, and results. ['Provide vision, leadership and strategic direction for Self-Help’s communications and marketing staff and operations.', 'Collaborate with Self-Help business teams to determine strategic marketing goals and oversee the creation and execution of communications strategies to accomplish these.', 'Lead organization-wide and line of service-specific online and offline channel campaigns to support business goals and objectives. Develop a positive working relationship with key internal stakeholders and a deep understanding of business goals and objectives. Deliver campaigns that drive results for individual business lines (e.g. membership growth and loyalty, consumer lending, deposit growth, commercial lending, real estate development, etc.). Measure and report campaign and promotion results. Manage campaign budgets, spend and effectiveness.', 'Build campaigns that clearly reflect Self-Help’s brand in strategic positioning, visual presentation and in the content and tone of messaging.', 'Oversee pre-emptive, proactive media relations plans addressing targeted audiences to increase earned media coverage and mitigate risk around key issues. Develop a comprehensive crisis communications plan and manage crises as they arise (and/or manage outside crisis consultants when appropriate).', 'Enhance Self-Help’s public websites to drive traffic, generate leads and increase repeat visitors. Evaluate Self-Help’s online marketing performance and lead the marketing team in creating an excellent web and social media presence that expands and enhances awareness of Self-Help.', 'Stay apprised of emerging marketplace and consumer trends, including technology, markets, products, services, customer experience and competition, to identify opportunities to sustain and grow the credit union.', 'Provide timely and relevant demographic and market insights to strengthen Self-Help’s ability to identify, anticipate, and respond to member, technological and competitive market trends.', 'Make recommendations to management on the implementation of new services and promotions, evaluating current services and marketing programs regularly to adjust based on results.', 'Continually learn and stay at the forefront of trends and market forces in credit unions and financial services.', 'Support or lead efforts to measure credit union quality of service, member attitudes and feedback through Net Promoter Score (NPS) or other tools.', 'Remain current on laws and regulations that affect marketing, ensuring marketing pieces, disclosures, and web site are technically and legally compliant.', 'Establish and maintain relationships with stakeholders, creating strong partnerships with multiple internal teams and leaders. As appropriate, lead or participate in functional and cross-functional teams.', 'Lead the continuous development of Self-Help’s brand and voice, to build awareness, uniqueness, relevance and reputation among target consumers. Develop, maintain and ensure adherence to brand guidelines across all activities and all marketing and communications channels.', 'Work with other Self-Help leaders to create and deliver compelling messages that enhance the perception of Self-Help among key audiences.', 'Expand Self-Help’s social media dialogue with key influencers and audiences and monitor key social media trends to identify new opportunities to proactively engage with Self-Help followers and potential followers. Manage and analyze results of social media initiatives to drive continuous improvement.', 'Oversee Self-Help’s internal communications efforts, with a focus on building trust and connection with employees around the organization. This includes driving engagement through innovative approaches and tools as well as high-quality storytelling that keeps employees informed about what’s happening at Self-Help.', 'Build, manage and coach a high-performing marketing team, including coaching and mentoring of direct reports, setting annual goals, assigning and reviewing work, providing training and development opportunities, and conducting performance evaluations.', 'Foster a work environment that ensures high levels of organizational effectiveness and communication.', 'Establish and monitor the annual marketing budget to maximize cost-effective operations, programs, etc. Manage vendor contracts and relationships to obtain preferable pricing, terms and service levels.', 'Act as a change agent to drive Self-Help’s economic inclusion initiatives by integrating supplier diversity and the use of businesses owned by women and people of color in third party contracting and vendor management for relevant products and services.', 'Provide thought leadership and direction for marketing automation and use of third-party vendors.', 'BA/BS or equivalent experience in Marketing, Communications, Economics, Business or related area.', '8+ years additional experience in marketing with a proven track record of success in managing a range of marketing functions such as brand management, customer marketing, digital marketing, creative services and communications.', 'Significant experience in working with and leading high-performance cross-functional teams to deliver complex communications and marketing programs that are strategic and results driven.', 'Hands on experience with CRM and SEO tools like Google Analytics, SalesForce, etc. preferred.', 'Public relations accreditation (APR) preferred.', 'Previous remote reporting relationships preferred.', 'Strong face-to-face, written, verbal and presentation skills.', 'Thorough understanding of research and communications messaging.', 'Ability to effectively run a multi-faceted, dynamic marketing department of a mid- to large-size financial institution. Ability to plan, implement, and evaluate the achievement of goals, objectives, and work plans.', 'Strong understanding of the marketing continuum and experience in multiple aspects of digital, retail and traditional marketing, including data and social media best practices.', 'Excellent leadership skills with a proven ability to lead, motivate, and supervise employees, as well as step in as a working manager with a hands on approach.', 'Good judgement with the ability to navigate complexity, change and nuance.', 'Excellent creative ability, and exceptional oral and written communication skills.', 'Strong public relations knowledge and understanding of social media platforms and their respective audiences.', 'Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships with a diverse group of people including colleagues, board members, employees, and other parties.', 'Ability to develop and manage budgets, balance multiple priorities, meet tight timelines and work effectively.', 'Experience managing third-party vendor and agency relationships.', "A leadership style that reflects and reinforces Self-Help's core values:", 'Mission Before Self', 'Service With Excellence', 'Embracing & Promoting Change', 'Results Not Credit', 'Diversity as a Strength', 'Financial Sustainability for Mission Impact', 'Close vision is required.', 'Employee is regularly required to: sit; talk and hear; use hands to finger, handle or feel; and reach with hands and arms.', 'Employee is frequently required to type and use a keyboard.', 'The employee must occasionally lift and/or move up to 20 to 40 pounds.']

job_text: ["Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.", '2 years of experience in advertising, sales, marketing, consulting, or media.', "Experience using Google's measurement suite products, website analytics platforms (Google Analytics) and brand analysis techniques.", 'Experience using Firebase and/or other app trackers solutions', 'Experience using SQL to extract and manipulate data, or with other programming or scripting languages such as R, Python, C++.', 'Experience with marketing analytics, return on investment/financial modeling, and statistical analysis.', 'Ability to analyze large datasets and prioritize them to actionable insights.', 'Develop solutions for client business and marketing challenges while also uncovering opportunities. the company while coordinating with teams to design their unique onboarding practices.', 'Performance Management: develop and maintain consistent performance management practices that are authentic to the DELVE values and culture.', 'Compensation Management: research and maintain data on external compensation for roles while leading the effort to create a compensation management system and support the transition to greater compensation transparency at DELVE.', 'Benefits Management: ensure smooth operation of benefits programs, communicate with teammates regarding benefits changes, enrollment, and any needed training.', 'Diversity and Inclusion: recruit for diversity while supporting a culture of inclusion with ongoing training for the team.', 'Learning Culture: promote a ‘growth mindset’ at DELVE including developing and maintaining systems and practices for individual learning as well as for team learning.', '5+ years of experience in People Operations in an international organization (tech company experience preferred)', 'Top-notch recruiting and hiring experience including understanding of current D&I practices', 'Must be self-directed with prior experience at a rapidly growing company', 'Experience in an Agile technology environment is strongly desired', 'Understanding of non-traditional performance management processes', 'Strong interpersonal, communication, and collaboration skills, and ability to work seamlessly with people in both the US and Europe', 'Excellent organization skills including process creation, change management, and project management', 'Experience with learning culture/deliberately developmental organizations is a plus', 'Ownership of your work, responsibility to make things happen and the opportunity to make a real difference', 'An opportunity to join a fast-paced and exciting global business in the advertising technology sector', 'A culture that emphasizes honesty, teamwork, and a great work-life balance', 'A competitive salary and opportunities to define your career growth', '100% covered health insurance', 'Matching 401k', 'Life insurance, disability insurance, flexible-spending/health-savings account', '1 work from home day per week & flexible working hours as needed', '15 days of PTO + 9 yearly paid holidays + a paid week off between Christmas Eve & New Years Day', 'One comped on-site & in-garage parking spot', 'Annual ski pass']

['Assist in the design, implementation and testing of digital analytics strategies', 'Analyze website, app, and campaign metrics with direction from the Digital Analytics team', 'Assist in the creation of reports and analysis for marketing clients', 'Assist in the creation of conversion rate optimization recommendations', 'Analytical and problem solving skills', 'Experience with Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager (Adobe Analytics experience is a plus)', 'Web Development (JavaScript, HTML) background or real world experience', 'A passionate, positive, and willing-to-learn attitude']

['Work alongside some of the most talented technologists out there as part of a tight, high-performing team of product designers, engineers, data scientists, and clinicians.', 'Dive deep into our growing database to produce analyses for the Product, Clinical, and Marketing teams and report key findings.', 'Troubleshoot issues and provide support for analytics data sources and tools.', 'Create dynamic and interactive reports or dashboards for internal and external use.', 'Maintain comprehensive and up-to-date documentation, and ensure proper data governance.', 'Collaborate with stakeholders to understand analytics needs, set priorities, and work on multiple projects simultaneously.', 'A BS/MS in Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics or related field', 'Minimum two years of experience as a Data Analyst or similar role', 'Experience using SQL to query multidimensional and complex datasets from data warehouses (e.g. AWS Redshift, Snowflake, PostgreSQL, Google BigQuery)', 'A deep understanding of data visualization techniques and appropriate use cases', 'Proficiency with statistical testing, modeling, and analysis using Python/R', 'Experience providing self-service analytics using BI/data visualization tools (e.g. Tableau, Looker, Power BI)', 'A methodical approach to solving problems with excellent attention to detail', 'Work or internship experience at a technology company', 'Experience using Business Intelligence tools (eg. Looker)', 'Experience with predictive analytics and machine learning', 'Familiarity with behavioral analytics tools (e.g. Mixpanel, Amplitude, Google Analytics)', 'Familiarity with data ingest and ETL pipelines (AWS Lambda, Snowpipe, Snowplow)']

['More planet and climate-friendly food choices and agricultural policies.', 'Promoting lifestyle medicine and whole foods plant-based nutritional education as an essential part of medical school curricula.', 'Advocating for the elimination of the routine use of antibiotics in industrial meat production.', 'Reducing or eliminating government subsidies of unhealthy foods and crops.', 'Visit foodrevolution.org for more information about our mission and our founders.', 'Define, develop, implement, and maintain a content publishing workflow.', 'Develop a process to identify new content and repurposing opportunities, and guide the process of mapping overall content strategy.', 'Optimize content publishing capacity and efficiency.', 'Drive and/or supervise workflow for the production of articles, summits, courses, and other content products.', 'Work directly with the CEO and President to develop a deep understanding of style, values, point of view, and voice.', 'Work with speakers, presenters and guest experts to bring out their voice, market their message, and help their contributions to flow into FRN structures and story arcs.', 'Write or contribute to sales copy, when necessary.', 'Serve as a member of the Leadership Team, working cross-functionally with other organizational leaders in helping to vision and implement overall direction.', 'Work closely with the CEO to envision, guide, create, write, edit, and drive implementation of content to bring FRN’s mission and impact into the world including articles, email copy, special reports, recipes, books, ebooks, infographics, launch page copy, video scripts, courses, masterclasses, etc.', 'Drive forward the organization’s research, vision, and goals for high-quality, industry-leading content strategy and production, working with appropriate team members to do so.', 'Create and implement plans to reach those goals.', 'Build and cultivate the team that fulfills these objectives.', 'Create, organize, and generally manage editorial calendars.', 'Ensure content meets style, tone, and content requirements of the organization (e.g., search engine optimization, readability, point of view, credibility).', 'Drive production of 2+ original articles per week.', 'Drive production of short and long courses, bundles, resource kits, and other educational products.', 'Maintain timelines and due dates so that content deliverables are completed when they need to be.', 'Use project management tools and principles to optimize the team’s flow of projects, milestones, tasks, and accomplishments.', 'Recruit, hire, onboard, and manage long term and seasonal content-focused team members and contractors.', 'Schedule and lead regular meetings to push forward content deliverables.', 'Manage content-focused team personnel toward the completion of projects and fulfillment of cross-functional content-related deliverables.', 'Delegate tasks to appropriate team members.', 'Assess team capacity.', 'Assign priorities to tasks.', 'Respond to team and organizational needs.', 'Monitor and participate in team communication channels.', 'Champion project management, productivity, communication and accountability skills development in team members.', 'Participate in leadership meetings and training.', 'Well versed in, passionate and knowledgeable about plant-based nutrition and the mission of Food Revolution Network.', 'Familiarity and alignment with the teachings of Dr. Michael Greger, Dr. Joel Fuhrman, John Robbins, Ocean Robbins, and other leaders in the whole foods plant-based movement.', 'Curious to learn about food and health topics, and eager to educate others.', 'Comfortable reading medical journals and translating them into lay terms; a natural story-teller.', 'Ability to multi-task and work collaboratively in a fast-paced startup-type environment.', 'Possess both intellectual and emotional intelligence, with a high level of integrity and broad outlook. Adaptable and dependable.', 'Leadership, listening skills, and collaborative attitude with teams. Adept in people management and negotiation for win-win outcomes.', 'Good judgment, competent decision-making, critical thinking and problem-solving skills.', 'Well-developed use of language in verbal and written communication. Strong reporting, documentation, proofreading and editing skills; organized and detail-oriented.', 'Effective time management, tolerance for stress, and ability to delegate and meet deadlines. Willingness to do whatever it takes during intense launch periods to achieve successful results.', 'Non-defensive in giving and receiving constructive feedback.', 'Committed to a healthy lifestyle, positive team culture, and personal growth.', 'Functional expertise in software such as Google Suite, Zoom, Slack, Jira and LastPass, or similar programs.', 'Strong video communication and presentation skills.', 'Mac OS computer preferred.', 'Annual salary of $72k - $96k+ depending on experience', 'Potential performance bonuses', 'Full-time employment doing fulfilling work in an online-based educational organization which advocates for organic, non-GMO, plant-strong, fair-trade foods, and supports movements for healthy food and environmental sustainability worldwide.', 'Live anywhere and work remotely from your home office, but we prefer North America-compatible time zones, and we require adaptability to Pacific Time for meetings and production deadlines.', '12 days (96 hrs.) Federal Holidays (Floating Holidays)', '12 days (96 hrs.) paid vacation per year, accrued at one per month with a maximum accumulation of 24', '12 days (96 hrs.) Wellness/Sick Days', '3 POS Comprehensive medical insurance plan options (100% employee coverage)', 'Dental insurance (50% coverage)', 'Vision insurance (employee paid)', '3 Medical Plus Plan options', '401(k) matching up to 4% after 12 months of employment', 'Travel for meetings 1-4x per year, at company expense', 'Health Savings Account', 'Flexible Spending Account']

job_title: Multichannel Insights and Analytics Sr Consultant
job_text: ['Lead all analytic outputs to client: presentation format, quality of analysis, recommendations, optimizations, and interactions with agency partners and client stakeholders', 'Translate client needs into insightful and actionable deliverables and successfully convey the resulting insights, thereby building strong, trustworthy partnerships.', 'Development and presentation of customer insights recommendations to optimize media buying across HCP and/or DTC (Direct to Consumer) campaigns', 'Analyze Audience Quality reports, Rx Impact analysis, front end media data (Impressions, cost) to inform optimization recommendations including shifting spend toward placements that will improve quality of reach, efficiency, or conversion.', 'Identify new ways to analyze data which uncover new customer insights and drive greater client value.', 'Help develop and evolve current measurement capabilities to ensure IQVIA stays a leader in measurement and targeting capabilities.', 'Support the development of measurement plans, including recommending which KPIs to report on', 'Provide input into campaign testing strategies and partner with Advanced Analytics for test sizing.', 'Collaborate with client and internal IQVIA teams to provide input into content and message development as well as tactic and channel selection based on customer insights', 'Create easy-to-understand and strategy, customer insights, or media analytics experience in the life sciences vertical', 'Experience working digital measurement products to understand Audience Quality and Rx Impact', 'Experience with integrated promotional campaigns across TV, digital display, search, mobile, email, direct mail, peer-to-peer, social media, and sales.', 'Experience with BI/Data visualization platforms communication skills', 'Strong knowledge of DTC media (TV, Billboard), digital (video, search, social) and emerging channels- addressable TV, targeted, programmatic', 'Proficiency in at least two or three digital marketing channel (Emails, Mobile Alerts, Search, Social, Display, Programmatic)', 'Proficiency in cross channel analysis (channel synergies, attribution, etc.)', 'Solid understanding of life science industry data, including IQVIA data assets (Xponent, Plan Trak, APLD) and core offerings a plus', 'Experience analyzing APLD data- Source of Business- New to Brand, Switch, or Continuing Adobe SiteCatalyst a plus', 'Experience with web tagging tools such as Google Tag Manager', 'External Job DescriptionExternal Job DescriptionRole DescriptionWe are seeking Consultants for multi-channel marketing insight and analytics delivery team. The successful candidates will leverage their analytical skillset to guide the optimization of media campaigns (offline and online advertising) across Consumer and/or HCP. The individual will build visualizations, and a suite of reports, ensuring it meets client business needs. The consultant must be able to present complicated analytics in a clear and concise manner with client multi-channel insight team, advanced analytics team, and brand marketing.The consultant may be asked to use advanced analytic outputs to provide data driven recommendations to plan, execute, and optimize integrated multichannel campaigns. Experience with digital audience quality (AdIQ), Rx impact, pathing analysis, voice of customer, user behavior, waterfall, and testing shall be used to improve the customer experience or content engagement. The Consultant should be familiar with the major web analytics tools, in particular with Adobe or Google Analytics. They should have knowledge and understanding of site QA, tagging requirements, CX tools, and tag management tools. Consultant will work with data enablement team to identify gaps in the data capture strategy and collaboratively implement enhancements. The ideal candidate will have a passion for insights and analytics in a healthcare environment.ResponsibilitiesLead all analytic outputs to client: presentation format, quality of analysis, ['Ability to develop detailed action plans to successfully plan and execute an initiative or project', 'Expertise in the setup, utilization and analysis of statistical data from website stats packages (i.e. Google Analytics, Omniture, Coremetrics, etc.) to identify and react to key visitor trends, as well as the utilization of in-house and third-party data sources.', 'Experience in and familiarity with all aspects of e-commerce and online marketing.', 'Top-notch analytical skills and the ability to leverage statistical techniques (i.e. correlation, regression, etc.) to synthesize data from multiple sources', 'Expertise with advanced-level Microsoft Excel required; experience with SQL highly desirable', 'A strong sense for clean visual design that is simplistic in nature and is highly usable', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills and the ability to clearly and persuasively present results', 'Comfortable in working in fast-moving, agile development environments', 'Be accustomed to giving time estimates and meeting deadlines.', 'Utilize in-house and third-party data sources to compile daily, weekly and ad hoc reporting; interpret and act on this data to evaluate success and identify areas of opportunity', 'Conduct root cause analysis of trends observed and act independently to change offers and testing strategies based on results', 'Performs the research, data gathering and analysis necessary to determine the requirements for new products and services and the associated strategies for pricing, promotional campaigns and channels to market (sales and distribution)', 'Coordinates with the appropriate staff in Community Relations, Marketing and IT to keep the Chartered website updated with current product, promotional and grass roots/community relations information.', 'Helps develop messaging and ideas for new marketing communications and promotional campaigns.', 'Helps develop artifacts, deliverables and communications that are key components of product, promotion, pricing and channel strategy, development and execution.']

We let you work at your own place, as long as you get your work done.', 'Flexible Schedule', 'Monday to Friday', 'One location', 'Multiple locations', 'Fully Remote', 'Pay', 'https://www.klyxx.co/', 'Yes']

job_title: Sr Data Scientist (work from home position)
job_text: ['Utilize advanced statistical techniques to create high performing predictive models and creative analyses to address business objectives and client needs. Tests new statistical analysis methods, software and data sources for continual improvement of quantitative solutions.', 'Work with Business SMEs to create models which predict the outcome of key business processes', 'Lead and contribute to data analysis and modeling projects from project or prototype design', 'Gathering and analyzing data, identifying key prediction/classification problems, devising solutions and building prototypes.', 'Follow industry trends in related data analytics processes and businesses.', 'Develop high-performance algorithms for predictive analytics. Testing and implementing these algorithms in scalable, product-ready code.', 'Ideal candidate will possess a PhD with at least 3+ years of data science expertise; However candidates with equivalent and relevant years of experience in lieu of Post graduate Degree will be reviewed', 'Advanced applied statistics skills, such as distributions, statistical testing, regression, etc.', 'Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests, etc.', 'Strong algorithmic problem solving and software development skills (R, Python, or similar)', 'Demonstrated capability to develop proof-of-concept prototypes for experimenting with novel algorithms', 'Demonstrated experience and accomplishments in the use of data mining, machine learning, and predictive analytics to address real-life problems.', 'Past experience in analyzing large scale data and distributed algorithms', 'Excellent analytical, communication (both verbal and written), interpersonal, and organizational skills.', 'Must be able to communicate effectively and clearly present technical approaches and findings.', 'LI-EH1']

job_title: Alfred Fleishman Diversity Fellowship TRUE Global Intelligence
job_text: ['Monitor, research, compile and analyze client media coverage in both online and offline channels', 'Conduct secondary research via Google, research databases and other sources', 'Assist with qualitative and/or quantitative primary research projects, such as analyzing survey data, taking notes during focus groups/in-depth interviews, analyzing qualitative data and writing research reports', 'Assist with media analysis projects by creating charts in Excel and developing insights to explain key findings', 'Contribute to the new business process, including research and proposal preparation', 'Contribute to agency diversity and inclusion initiatives', 'A minimum of a 3.2 GPA', 'Completion of their junior year of college, though recent graduates are preferred', 'Three previous internships or equivalent experiences, at least one of which must be focused on research, analytics, communications', 'A strong career interest in communications, research, analytics', 'Academic coursework or professional experience in primary research (qualitative, quantitative or both)', 'Academic coursework or professional experience in secondary research, such as literature reviews, research papers and media summaries', 'A demonstrated passion for ethnic or cultural diversity', 'Strong analytical and writing skills, with the ability to condense and summarize research data into meaningful findings', 'The ability to work a minimum of 30 hours per week', 'Completed application', 'Resume and cover letter', 'Two writing samples — news releases, pitch letters, media alerts, newsletter articles, executive summaries, and other relevant writing items; please limit each sample to two pages', 'Does FH provide relocation assistance to fellows? We do not offer financial relocation assistance for the fellowship; however, we do offer information and resources to aid fellows in their housing search.', 'Can applicants apply to multiple locations? The program application asks for your top three location preferences, but you may also apply to other locations of interest. In addition, we may contact you to inquire about your interest in locations to which you have not applied if your background aligns with our needs.', 'Does FH provide visa sponsorship for fellows? We are unable to provide visa sponsorship for the fellowship. However, we do accept all applicants who are authorized to work in the United States, including those on student visas.', 'How many fellowship positions are available? The number of fellows hired each year varies based on office and business needs at that time.', 'What is the duration of the fellowship? Fellowships are intended to last a minimum of six months up to one year.', 'When will applicants be contacted for interviews? The interview process begins in March and typically concludes with hiring decisions in late April.', 'Where should letters of recommendation be sent? If requested, letters of recommendations should be submitted as an attachment and emailed to DiversityFellowship@fleishman.com.', 'To whom should application materials be addressed? Materials should be addressed to the AFDF Selection Committee.', 'Where do I upload materials? Materials should be uploaded under the resume/attachments section of your online application.']

['Identify and ensure alignment on key performance Indicators', 'Develop and execute monitoring and measurement plans based on objectives and agreed-upon KPIs.', 'Gather data from third-party tools as well as owned channels and native platforms to generate ongoing performance reports', 'Analyze data sets (media, social media, etc.) to pull actionable insights and help evolve the overall strategy', 'Track community conversations through social listening to identify key influencers, areas of opportunity, content trends, brand sentiment, competitors, and general community insights', 'Monitor and track discussion topics for management team; prepare weekly/monthly reports to update staff/clients on predetermined metrics; proactively monitor brand and relevant themes/news stories within the blogosphere and provide suggestions for timely content, assets and conversations within brand communities', 'Use online listening, supplemental research and daily community learnings to provide', 'insights for improving programs and enhancing program successes', 'Contribute to the evolution of brand, communication, and social strategies and communicate insights gathered to the assigned Account and Creative teams.', 'Partner with Media to synthesize measurement efforts for paid online media placements with social media monitoring and paid and unpaid analytics.', 'Partner with Brand/Comms Strategists and Account Managers to communicate the value of social media monitoring and analytics to clients.', 'Lead efforts in developing holistic measurement action plans across all channels for client campaigns', 'Lead investigative efforts for client measurement inquiries (digital and offline)', '4+ years of professional work experience within an agency setting', 'Must have a background in analyzing data (site, media, social media) and generating reports, as well as using social listening and monitoring tools to derive insights.', 'Ability to translate your research & observations into clear, insightful and visually stimulating presentations that tell a compelling story.', 'Ability to clearly and convincingly present findings and insights in a way that demonstrates the value of the data and analysis to clients', 'Experience with Google Analytics and/or Adobe Analytics (Omniture)', 'Ability to think outside of the box about measurement and analysis methodology and design measurement plans based on client needs', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills with ability to present ideas and information clearly; keen eye for detail also required.', 'Experience and comfort level presenting to clients and key agency stakeholders', 'Collaborative team player able to integrate with a diverse, talented team.']

["Internal cross-functional marketing management / Drive new product/program development in partnership with General Managers, exploring new growth opportunities at existing universities. Discover and build upon program marketing opportunities based on collected data and analysis. Build strong partnership across an internal cross-functional marketing team and support the team's professional development. Seek opportunities to bring internal teams together in order to share knowledge and best practices. Work closely with demand generation management to optimize marketing strategy across assigned universities and ensure best practices are communicated down to managers and coordinators. Able to lead challenging conversations with senior-level internal stakeholders (up to C-level). Actively seek and welcome challenging assignments to improve overall team and business performance, proactively pulling appropriate teams together to enact change.", "Develop and execute a data-influenced marketing strategy / Lead a team in identifying opportunities across programs and at a university-wide level, creating solutions to increase efficiency and effectiveness. Evaluate program performance within the portfolio of assigned programs and ensure that direct reports take appropriate actions. Serve as a critical thought partner with organic and paid marketing functions. Oversee new program launches, delegating as appropriate to Brand Marketing Managers and Coordinators. Provide leadership and strategic vision to help attract multiple audiences such as high school students, online and adult learners, parents, graduate students, etc. Monitor for and enact potential process improvements, given one's wide view of the entire launch cycle and program lifecycle. Responsible for quarterly and annual planning, in partnership with Brand Marketing VP.", "Leadership & management / Directors are responsible for prioritization and delegation for their team, a critical role given the large area of responsibility and considerable demands on their time. Manage a team of five Brand Marketing Managers and Coordinators, driving them to meet or exceed established goals. Work alongside managers as needed to oversee university partner relationships and drive results. Ensure that these managers recognize and assess opportunities, and have the resources necessary to create solutions. Proactively consider opportunities to delegate tasks as a way to build team strengths, scale the business and lighten demands on one's own time. Allocate coordinators' time to best meet the needs of assigned programs and universities.", 'External relationship management / Ensure strong partner relationship management across the team, leading by example. Able to lead challenging conversations with senior level external stakeholder (up to dean level). Must be able to present/communicate sophisticated marketing topics to university partners, including to those without significant marketing backgrounds. Work with General Managers to explore opportunities across a given university. job_title: HVT Target Analyst- SR. All Source
job_text: ['Must maintain active/current TS/SCI clearances.', 'Government trained intelligence analysts with a minimum of 8-years of intelligence analysis and targeting experience.', '12-years of related experience.', 'Background in counter-terrorism, counter insurgency, or counter IED analysis and experience as an intelligence or targeting analyst in Afghanistan.', 'This position requires a minimum of a 6-month deployment.', 'Knowledgeable of the Intelligence Cycle, Collection Management Cycle, Targeting Cycle and intelligence analytic techniques including trend and pattern analysis, geospatial analysis, link analysis and network or social network analysis. The Contractor shall be experienced with data processing systems such as DCGS-A, CIDNE, and SIPRNET and JWICS search engines.', 'Working knowledge of i2 Analyst Notebook, AXIS Pro, WebTAS, ArcGIS, and Google Earth.', 'Be proficient at using basic computer applications and intelligence related automation to support analytical efforts and product development; possess strong research, writing and editing skills; and be capable of managing teams of analysts in support of tactical, strategic and special operations forces conducting counter insurgent/IED targeting.', 'Understand intelligence requirements for both lethal and non-lethal targeting.', 'Possess any of the following MOS: 31D, 311D, 35F, 350F, 35D, 18F, 180A, or DoD joint service equivalent, or civilian 0132, 1811.', 'Experience supporting a SOF Task Force highly desired and preferred.', 'We’ve been named a Best Place to Work by the Washington Post.', 'Our employees value the flexibility at CACI that allows them to balance quality work and their personal lives.', 'We offer competitive benefits and learning and development opportunities.', 'We are mission-oriented and ever vigilant in aligning our solutions with the nation’s highest priorities.', 'For over 55 years, the principles of CACI’s unique, character-based culture have been the driving force behind our success.']

['Accomplish department and team level objectives by communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, and appraising job results; coaching, counseling, and corrective action; developing, coordinating, and enforcing systems, policies, procedures, and productivity standards.', 'Responsible for the overall direction, coordination, and evaluation of collection and/or recovery functions which may include, but are not limited to: communication campaigns, inbound and outbound call strategies, short-term and long-term assistance, workout payment plans based on advice from Finance, post charge-off recovery strategies, disconnection of services process, and other operations and quality control functions for the purpose of limiting Partner delinquency and charge-off.', 'Research, develop and facilitate collection procedures according to company policies. Conduct periodic reviews of existing systems, procedures and workflows to ensure highest level of Partner service, productivity, internal control and legal compliance.', 'Support team with the evaluation of customer financial circumstances, problem resolution, escalations, and the development of recommendations to assist the customer and mitigate losses, delinquencies and avoid future complaints.', 'Ensure proper preparation and delivery of letters, notices, and other communications.', 'Review various reports to ensure that proper tracking is in place to effectively evaluate and improve processes and metrics within the business unit. Provide and develop management reporting to support determining mid-term and long-term strategic goals.', 'Responsible for daily case/ticket assignment to team and meet SLAs in Salesforce (Netsuite as a future state). Optimize staffing aligned with workload and SLAs.', 'Provide and develop operational reporting on day to day team productivity. Communicate the status of delinquent accounts to the management or other appropriate personnel.', "Review accounts and recommend for charge-off as appropriate; supervise approved accounts' charge-off procedure.", 'Develop, mentor and manage the performance of the collections team.', 'Assist in budgeting, forecasting and ad hoc reporting specific to Department needs.', 'Proven track record of managing full cycle collections strategies for retail credit products like credit cards etc. 7+ years of collections experience in a professional services firm required.', "A bachelor's degree (preferably Masters or higher) with an interest in quantitative analytics.", 'Delivers excellent results that exceeds requirements, plans appropriately to meet multiple objectives and is forward thinking on inter-dependencies to proactively identify and resolve issues.', 'Solid understanding of collections as well as behavioral scoring models esp. for retail credit products. Generally clear, concise and structured, and is able to explain complex concepts in a simple manner. Detail oriented and process oriented, team player.', 'Deep thinker capable of processing a lot of information towards most optimal decision making.', 'Demonstrated strong knowledge of cash applications and related accounting processes', 'Strong problem-solving and supervisory experience required', 'Technical skills: Advanced Excel/Google sheets, SQL, Tableau, Lucid Charts, Salesforce, Netsuite, Zuora. Strong understanding of financial accounting and CRM systems (Salesforce, Netsuite, Zuora) a plus.', 'Comprehensive health-care benefits', 'Free lunch every Friday', 'Flexible paid time off policy', 'Free food, drinks, and fresh organic fruit', 'Fitness reimbursement', 'Charity match program', 'Education reimbursement', 'And more!']

They should be able to communicate and coordinate at all levels to their fellow team members and media partners to ensure an efficient communication flow both internally and externally.', 'Assistant Media Planners should have a basic knowledge of media terminology and the math behind it. Additionally, they should have a basic understanding of digital, print, broadcast, and out of home media. Growth opportunities with ongoing mentorship will be available to increase their proficiency across all these areas.', 'Assistant Media Planners should have the ability to support the planning team in research through proprietary and syndicated tools for audience analysis, development of campaign strategy, media planning, and competitive analysis. AMPs will learn how to utilize media research tools through a combination of hands on training and self-paced training.', "Writing point of view (POV) papers to help evaluate opportunities for the client is often a regular planning function. Assistant Media Planners should be able to have conversations with media partners to understand an opportunity, use the media resources available to them to evaluate the opportunity against the media marketplace, leverage their knowledge of their client's goals and objectives to see if this is on target and within the current strategy, and write up an informative yet concise POV for their client.", 'Assistant Media Planners should have the ability to work on and manage multiple tasks at any given time, and possess a high attention to detail and accuracy. It is also important that assistants are able to take full responsibility for their work, and be able to prioritize work to meet any and all project deadlines.', 'Knowledge of Microsoft Applications, particularly Excel and PowerPoint is a must. Ideally Assistant Media Planner would have prior experience developing Excel spreadsheets and managing large amounts of data and digital files', 'Strong analytical and organizational skills are extremely important for Assistant Media Planners; because data analysis is a large part of the job assistants need to have the ability to think quantitatively, to work with and organize large amounts of data, and to understand nuances in data', 'TraditionalClear Decisions, IMS TV & Radio Marketmate, AdViews, MediaOcean (DDS), T*ViewUnderstanding of Simmons & MRI SurveysDigitalcomScore, Atlas, DoubleClick and MediaVisor, @Plan, AdRelevance', 'TraditionalArbitron e-Book, Forrester, Pointlogic Chorus/Galileo, Nielsen ConsumerPoint, Nielsen Local Toolbox, Nielsen Outdoor Planner, Nielsen PrimeLocation, SRDS, SQAD, Arbitron & Nielsen rating booksDigitalGoogle AdWords, Yahoo!/Bing AdCenter, Google Analytics, Understanding of Kenshoo/Marin (Search)']

job_title: Customer Onboarding Manager, Boston or San Francisco
job_text: ['Contribute to developing and deploying onboarding process and content changes to the Customer team.', 'Influence internal behavior cross-functionally to get buy-in for onboarding initiatives.', 'Serve as a mentor and coach for Onboarding Specialists.', 'Support the onboarding of new Drift customers to deploy their Conversational Marketing strategy including configuration, training, go-live support, and optimization.', 'Partner closely with our Customer Success Managers and Account Managers to solidify and execute client deployment strategy based on customer goals and KPIs.', 'Lead client onboarding tasks including configuration and training, based on Conversational Marketing best practices.', "Develop a solid understanding of your customer's marketing and sales tech stack, including the information that flows through it to be pushed into and pulled out of Drift to drive accurate attribution.", 'Monitor new client performance and address any open issues to ensure timely resolution and great customer experience.', 'Work closely with the product and engineering team to influence new product features and functionality based on customer feedback.', 'Attend comprehensive organization training and learn the Drift story, our leadership principles, how we communicate and do work, as well as our goals for the future.', 'Experience in-depth product training, including learning how to use the product for your own business.', 'Gain a detailed understanding of the customer lifecycle, with emphasis on post-sale onboarding and success processes.', 'Have 1:1 meetings with your direct manager and meet with other key players on the customer team.', 'Shadow colleagues and learn best practices for what make Drift Customers successful.', 'Begin to be fully responsible for your very own portfolio of customers and for running calls independently!', 'Fully understand our internal ecosystem and be able to collaborate cross-functionally to provide the best in class sales process.', 'Work with your customers daily, delivering value and helping them achieve their goals.', 'Should be meeting your Customer Onboarding targets and KPIs', 'Drive customers successfully through onboarding in a fast paced environment.', 'Master conversational sales and marketing practices.', 'Consistently meet or exceed your onboarding and professional services goals.', 'Support complex onboarding engagements for our largest customers.', 'Work with your manager to identify a plan for continued growth.', 'Bring your thinking, strategy, and ideas to the team to advance ['This CSA Manager of Managers will directly manage a team of Data and AI CSA Managers that will be leading and managing CSAs covering Enterprise customers in their respective territory.', 'Be a technical thought leader and build trust with key technical decision makers and influencers across customers and partners. Provide clarity on enterprise wide data estate migration, modernization, transformation with respect to enterprise data architecture. Be comfortable addressing topics like information security, data governance, and compliance.', 'Experienced at building and maintaining relationships with delivery leaders from top Azure Data Global System Integrators, Partners, and Microsoft Consulting Services (MCS).', 'Possess exceptional cross-team collaboration and communication skills. Be effective at partnering with all required Microsoft stakeholders in the subsidiary to drive role clarity, account coverage, project assignment and effective cross-team collaboration', 'Hire, on-board, and develop CSA Managers to lead Data & AI CSAs. Be able to set a clear bar for excellence and build a high performing team that will be diverse and inclusive.', 'Coach and enable teams to accelerate Azure Data & AI projects from pilot/POC to production, including guidance on architectural design, technical recommendations, blocker escalations and technical resource orchestration', 'Develop strong connections with product and engineering leaders to facilitate thought leadership with customers, and act as voice of the customer and advocate for product related feedback', 'Ensure your team delivers high quality production deployments that are resilient and successful', 'Drive operational excellence, including timely consumption engagement management and high-quality reporting and insights', 'Technical Field Experience: 10+ years of experience in technical sales, engineering or consultative delivery', 'People Management: 7+ years of experience in people management', 'Domain experience in data & analytics: 3+ years of experience with the domains of data, analytics, and/or AI/ML', 'Communication. ['Passion and drive to simplify healthcare by building products that increase access to care and power every healthcare decision to be high-quality, cost-effective, and convenient', 'Commitment to Ribbon Health company values, working on an exceptional team, and building an exceptional company', 'Grit, hustle, desire, and a “get-it-done” attitude; strong comfort with a lean startup environment, where everyone is encouraged to participate in and contribute across all teams', 'While you love to analyze data, you are excited about automating data workflows so that anyone else can glean critical insights on how to use Ribbon’s core data set', 'You are proficient with SQL and have experience working with data at scale (e.g., EMR, Hadoop, Spark, HBase, Presto, Postgres)', 'You feel comfortable owning ML workflows, such as automating the training of a predictive model, the deployment of that model at scale, etc', 'You have some experience designing, building, and/or managing scalable systems in the cloud (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud, Azure)You have a track record of learning new technologies and languages on the job', 'Although you’ll initially work mostly in Python, you’ll help us continue to evaluate new technologies and find the best tools for the job at hand', 'Work closely with both business stakeholders and the machine learning team at Ribbon to democratize data access', 'Build and launch new models into production: You will work with the machine learning team to design, build, and launch new products and product features. job_title: Director of Strategic Communications (National Marketing & Communications) - Can be located in Milwaukee, Denver, St. Louis or Austin!
job_text: ['Leading Vivent Health’s successful and effective strategic communications and marketing efforts by developing and leading the execution of a proactive, innovative, analytics-driven, and comprehensive communications strategy that includes:', 'Identifying ad hoc issues requiring attention and recommending and executing options for achieving goal of enhancing the Vivent Health image and brand', 'Through a highly collaborative process with Vivent Health executive and senior leaders, lead strategic communications initiatives with multiple groups including prospective and current donors and supporters; current and prospective patients and clients; community leaders; local and national media; and other constituencies as identified', 'Ensure articulation of Vivent Health’s desired image and brand position, assure consistent communication of image and position throughout the agency, and assure communication of image and position to all constituencies', 'Provide leadership in the areas of editorial direction, design, production and distribution of all Vivent Health publications', 'Coordinate media interest in Vivent Health and ensure regular contact with target media and appropriate response to media requests', 'Develop, coordinate and oversee content marketing, providing technical assistance and resource materials as required to assist programmatic areas in the marketing, communications and positioning of their services and activities', 'Provide guidance to all programmatic areas on strategic communications including marketing, advertising, communications, and public relations', 'Regularly coordinate and conduct research into changing market trends, monitor trends, and make recommendations for needed adjustments in agency approach to its marketing activities', 'Lead projects as assigned, such as cause-related marketing, awareness campaigns and support for special events', 'Develop long- and short-term goals, plan and budget for the marketing, communication and public relations program and its activities, monitor progress towards goals, assure adherence and evaluate program performance', 'Maintain current knowledge on developments in the fields of marketing, communications and public relations and integrate new developments to allow Vivent Health to operate with initiative and innovation', 'Participate in efforts to increase health outcomes for patients by developing a strategic perspective in agency direction, programs, and services, and by seeking and sharing regular input from Vivent Health’s key constituencies regarding the quality of programs and services', 'Drive innovation in strategic communications to support patient, donor and stakeholder engagement and retention', 'Act as an internal consultant to bring attention and solutions to priorities and opportunities for growth', 'Assist in the formulation of policies to ensure the integrity of the agency', 'Collaborate with internal customers, including operations and fundraising, and help build Vivent Health’s National Strategy', 'Recruit, train, appraise, supervise, support, and develop qualified staff and volunteers, maintaining a climate that attracts and retains top quality personnel and promotes an environment conducive to engagement, empowerment, creativity, accountability, and productivity.', 'Any and all other duties as assigned by the Vice President and Chief Advocacy Officer.', 'Minimum of 7 years’ experience in innovative, strategic communications including marketing, external communications or public relations with demonstrated success in the design and execution of marketing, communications and public relations activities.', 'Strong creative, strategic, analytical leadership and organizational skills.', 'Experience overseeing the design and production of advertising and awareness campaigns, including those for fund development and programs/services for diverse communities', 'Demonstrated and successful written, verbal, video and other electronic/digital communication experience including but not limited to writing web content, press releases, making presentations and negotiating with media', 'Experience developing and managing budgets, hiring, training, supervising and developing staff.', 'Ability to manage multiple projects at a time.', 'Experience in marketing team management; providing leadership across multiple functions.', 'Experience creating fully integrated marketing campaigns, utilizing Email and Text campaigns, digital marketing, website efficiencies, outdoor media and traditional media with measured results.', 'Familiarity with social media platforms, digital expertise, Google analytics or another website tracking tool', 'Experience establishing branding and creative direction.', 'Advanced experience in public relations, marketing, or communications capacity.', 'Proven experience working with social media, Google Analytics, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), web accessibility best practices, web content management, and web application testing.', 'Demonstrated appetite for innovation and eagerness to continue to learn as new media options emerge.', 'Professionalism appropriate to Vivent Health with internal and external audiences, including industry partners.', 'Experience working in highly collaborative environments requiring interpersonal communication competence, initiative, listening, and emotional intelligence. Excellent written and oral communication skills.', 'Last, but not least, demonstrated value and passion for the persuasive power of story.', 'Knowledge of health and social service needs of persons with HIV/AIDS is preferred.', 'Dedication to social justice, including a commitment to LGBTQIA+ communities.']

job_title: Sr Data Scientist - Analytics Product Group
job_text: ['Engineer features and build models to identify cyber-enabled fraud in real-time. Evaluate the performance of such models over time, taking into account both structured and unstructured feedback from customers.', 'Develop systems and tools to enable our team to solve complex business problems (such as identifying fraud) and deliver valuable insights to customers.', 'Collaborate with engineering teams to seamlessly deploy models and tools for use in our products.', 'Work with product managers to map out and prioritize new product features.', 'Communicate insights to customers via robust visualizations and clear explanations.', 'Strong analytical skills including the ability to manipulate, model, interpret and visualize large quantities of structured data.', 'Strong proficiency in Python and SQL, and familiarity with web and mobile technologies. Experience with JavaScript is a plus.', 'Experience working with cybersecurity / fraud / trust and safety teams preferred, but not required.', 'A passion for developing and deploying tools for data analytics and visualization. Experience with relevant packages/tools/frameworks will be a plus (e.g. Jupyter notebooks, Pandas, Kibana, Flask).', 'Experience working in GCP, Azure, AWS, or other common cloud/data warehousing/app infrastructure.', 'Experience working with ML/AI systems will be a plus.', 'Strong interpersonal skills, personable, and persistent. A good listener. Self-motivated, able to work well both independently and as part of an agile team.', 'A demonstrated enthusiasm and capacity to learn new technologies quickly.', 'A scrappy yet meticulous approach, and a love for problem solving!']

['Own the Marketing Performance Management within Olive Marketing. You will use your exemplary analytical and data wrangling skills to answer key questions for the organization, both on an ongoing, cadenced basis, as well as ad hoc analysis as needed. You will generate reports and dashboards and train the team to use them, allowing them to consume insight on demand, creating a data-enabled Marketing organization. You will partner closely with Web, Campaigns, Events, and PR, to understand their reporting needs and seek to address through defined scope, requirements, and timeline definition.', 'Analysis and reporting will include both micro-level (asset performance, channel performance) and macro-level (Marketing Performance Management, Marketing Effectiveness, ROI) metrics. Analysis will require incorporation of data across business systems, analytics, and advertising platforms.', 'Support cross-functional reporting requests when determined appropriate by your supervisor and Chief Marketing Officer. These will be occasional, but consistent.', 'Data Strategy:', 'As the Marketing Team’s Analyst at Olive, you will work closely with the Operations team to define Olive Marketing’s data strategy and model, define and support processes to enable that strategy, and evolve strategy over time as the team grows and needs change and mature.', 'You will work seamlessly with Marketing Operations to incorporate new data sources within the data model as they are adopted by the Marketing team.', 'You will work with the Operations team to advise technology roadmap for the Analytics function within the team, maintaining expert knowledge of business intelligence landscape to inform.', '4-5 years in Marketing Analyst role working with datasets from multiple advertising and customer platforms such as Web analytics (GA, Google Studio and others), AdTech platforms such as Rollworks (NextRoll), paid media channels,LinkedIn, Adwords, CRM (Salesforce), and marketing automation (Pardot).', 'Proficiency working with data visualization tool such as Tableau, Looker, Alteryx, DOMO, Qliksense', 'Expert proficiency with SQL, Excel, and working with large data sets', 'Working knowledge of at least one scripting/statistical language (R or Python preferred)', 'Foundational understanding of digital marketing programs, technologies, and performance measurement', 'Ability to communicate actionable insight from findings to all audience types including technical, non-technical, Marketing, Sales, C Suite', 'Excel Macros capability a plus', 'Experience working with data piping/ETL tools a plus']

job_text: ['Actively manages the SideTrak marketing budget across all channels including digital media, traditional media, OTT, email, website, social media, and new opportunities.', 'Plans and oversees advertising and promotions to generate maximized revenue and profitability goals via media including print, broadcast, online, electronic media, email, social media, and direct marketing.', 'Analyze results and approve ads for all online advertising.', 'Monitor and analyze website CVR and make changes to improve results.', 'Leverage analytics, site testing, technology tools, and reports to identify, recommend, and implement optimizations and enhancements to the SideTrak site.', 'Analyze website SEO insights to optimize performance for better search engine ranking.', 'Establishes and monitors KPI’s daily, weekly, and monthly.', 'Monitors competitor products', 'Provide marketing team with appropriate training, coaching, and motivation that enables their success and establish a positive working environment.', 'Minimum 4 years of work experience in online marketing for a transactional eCommerce website and multi-channel sales (must include Amazon)', 'Minimum 4 years of work experience running online paid ad campaigns on Facebook and Google', 'Education Requirements: Bachelor’s Degree - ['Ensuring students have access to the resources and support they need in order to become Employer Ready and enter the job market.', 'Teaching students how to develop a successful job search strategy.', 'Coaching students through their job search.', 'Encouraging them to persist in the face of setbacks and disappointments.', 'Listening to, and addressing, and student concerns or challenges during their job search process.', 'Coordinate with our Industry Insights and Impact team (an employer-facing team) to match students to employment opportunities.', 'Build positive and trusting relationships with students across the country through phone, email, and video conference channels so that you can motivate and support students as they engage in sourcing potential jobs, interviewing and negotiating salaries.', 'Take a consultative approach to help students identify the roles and opportunities that align with their passions; help students tailor their professional materials for those specific opportunities.', "Maintain accurate and timely records of activity in Salesforce, including highly detailed notes about a student's activities and job prospects.", 'Respond to all student emails, texts, and voice messages within the same working day.', 'Encourage students to take advantage of the full suite of Career Service offerings including online workshops and events, and in-person Demo Days; collaborate with Profile Coaches to ensure all students have multiple opportunities to complete a high quality profile.', 'Interact with all students in a professional, service-oriented approach.', 'Utilize satisfaction data to understand strengths and opportunities for growth; implement learnings to increase satisfaction.', 'You have at least four years of experience in recruiting, education or process improvement.', 'You have previous experience in career services field or in professional coaching.', "You've worked in a capacity as a mentor, coach, case manager or other role where motivating others was essential to your success.", "You've had plenty of hits and misses, and can clearly discuss the lessons learned from those misses.", "You've successfully worked with a wide variety of individuals from diverse backgrounds.", 'You are technically savvy and pick up new software quickly. You have experience with, or a desire and ability to learn, various platforms including Google Docs, Zoom, and Salesforce.', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills.', 'You are excited to engage with students and provide to them daily coaching, support and encouragement throughout the job search process.', 'You utilize high quality coaching techniques to build relationships, drive results, and build the skills and mindsets of students to foster independence for lifelong success in their careers.', 'You are skilled at identifying areas in which students both excel and need to improve, and can deliver that feedback in ways that feel supportive to students and ignites them to take action.', 'You can build rapport quickly over the phone or video; students feel comfortable opening up to you and respect and listen to your recommendations.', 'You are interested and excited about becoming an expert in the career opportunities and employer needs of the industries our students are entering— Web Development, Data Analytics, Cybersecurity, UX/UI, Financial Technology, and Digital Marketing.', 'You have an eye for detail and are dedicated to maintaining accurate records and reports in Salesforce.', 'You know how to analyze data, draw learnings from it, and implement your findings to improve your career coaching.', 'You know how to work successfully in a remote environment.', 'Medical, dental, and vision coverage', 'Life insurance, disability and 401(k)', 'Unlimited snacks and drinks', 'Tuition reimbursement program', 'Generous paid leave policies including unlimited PTO', 'Additional time off benefits include: volunteer days, parental leave, and a company-wide winter break from Christmas through New Years!']
